entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

Humidity: 64 %

Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning then becoming west 20 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
